item.title: ~~~~~~~(@N $UM()N3 PL3@s3 H3LP~~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @Zlap Zlap
item.description:
@Zlap wrote:

I was recently given this code to make it so a player must kill a certain Npc to earn combat points.

He gave me this code to put into client.java

Code:
public int points = 0;

And This To Put Into NPC HANDLER

Code: if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) {
C.points += 1;
}

I would like to know if someone could please help me on telling me where i should put these codes.

Thank You For At Least Looking At This Post. All Help With Be Grateful

Read full topic
